DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.
Ignores #yBlock but deals #b20% less damage while doing so.
Target loses HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Applies #yChill equal to damage dealt. Targets deal #b1% less damage per stack #yChill they have.
Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage. Targets take up to double damage when #yShadow #ySplit exceeds their current HP.
An effect triggered if you play a card of the required type.
An #yUnplayable and #yRetaining card that has effects while in your hand. Has a limited number of #yUses and automatically #yExhausts when out.
Increase the effect of ALL copies of this card this combat.
Targets take up to double damage when #yShadow #ySplit exceeds their current HP.
